alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Shelbyville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, Simpsonville, Chestnut Grove, Montclair, Joyes, Middletown Heights, Conner and Todds Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Kentucky.
